ideas.title: The 3-Page Blueprint to Making $100/Day With a Small Facebook Group
ideas.topic: How to monetize a small Facebook group using proven content strategy
ideas.why_it_works: Strategy/System format averages 1,729 comments. Number '3' feels achievable vs overwhelming. Targets exact pain point of monetizing small audiences.
ideas.bridges_to_product: Shows the framework but students need the actual post examples to implement - creating desire for the $17 swipe file of proven posts

ideas.title: 5 Facebook Post Templates That Generate Daily Sales
ideas.topic: Ready-to-use Facebook post templates for monetization
ideas.why_it_works: Templates are highly actionable and swipe files perform well. Number '5' is digestible. Targets desire to generate consistent revenue from social media.
ideas.bridges_to_product: Gives them a taste of high-converting posts but they'll want the complete collection of 4 posts that made $12,847 - the proven winners

ideas.title: The 1-Page Cheat Sheet: Turn Low Engagement Into Cash
ideas.topic: Quick reference guide to transform dead Facebook groups into revenue
ideas.why_it_works: Cheat sheets average 808 comments and are perfect quick wins. Addresses core pain of low engagement while promising cash outcome.
ideas.bridges_to_product: Shows principles but they need specific post examples that actually worked - making them hungry for the real posts that generated $12,847
